Patent Information.Patent Title: Vaccine which comprises at least one antigen and a cathelididin derived antimicrobial peptide of a derivative thereof.
Patent Information.Abstract: Described is a vaccine which comprises at least one antigen and at least one cathelicidin derived antimicrobial peptide or a derivative thereof as well as the use of a cathelicidin derived antimicrobial peptide or a derivative thereof for the preparation of an adjuvant for enhancing the immune response to at least one antigen.
The present invention relates generally to peptides and more specifically to antimicrobial and immunomodulatory host defense peptides.

Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cathelicidin-1 (Bactenecin-1, Bac1; Cyclic dodecapeptide; mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1-8 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=8-25 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Potent microbicidal activity; active against S.aureus and E.coli.

Literature.Title: Structure and bactericidal activity of an antibiotic dodecapeptide purified from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Romeo D, Skerlavaj B, Bolognesi M, Gennaro R.

Literature.Title: cDNA sequence analysis of an antibiotic dodecapeptide from neutrophils.

Literature.Title: Purification and structural characterization of bovine cathelicidins, precursors of antimicrobial peptides.
